original_text: And Nobah went and took Kenath, and the villages thereof, and called it Nobah, after his own name.
korean_text: 노바는 가서 그낫과 그 마을들을 빼앗고 자기 이름을 따라서 노바라 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: And Nobah went and took Kenath
and called it Nobah, after his own name
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 이름을 따라 그곳을 놉이라 불렀다
